recipeList.directions: Directions: Heat a pan over medium heat and add bacon. Cook until desired crispness. Crack eggs into separate bowl, season with salt and pepper, and scramble. Add eggs to pan with bacon and cook together until eggs are scrambled and cooked through. Serve warm.
recipeList.ingredients: Ingredients: Eggs, bacon, salt and pepper to taste

recipeList.directions: Instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Saute chicken in a pan. Add cooked pasta to the pan, and mix with the creamy sauce. Serve immediately.
